content.value:
Using popular things is sucky.

When I have an issue with macOS or Windows, search results are dominated by SEO'd junk articles with little to no information.

When I have an issue with Linux, search results are usually awesome and get me directly to the juicy information.
content.html: Using popular things is sucky. When I have an issue with macOS or Windows, search results are dominated by SEO'd junk articles with little to no information. When I have an issue with Linux, search results are usually awesome and get me directly to the juicy information.
